name: blog-v5-on-heroku
description: Deploy latest ghost v5 on Heroku
author: blog

scripts.postinstall: ghost install --allow-root --no-check-empty --no-prompt --no-stack --no-setup --no-setup-linux-user --db sqlite3 && rm -rvf content  && cp -Rf package.json package-lock.json node_modules versions/*/; rm -rf node_modules ; echo 'INSTALL TO versions/*/ DONE' && cp -Rf versions/*/* .; echo 'INSTALL TO PWD DONE' && rm -rf versions current && bash -x bin/cloudinary.sh && bash -x bin/aws-s3.sh && bash -x bin/themes.sh && bash -x bin/init-deployment
